governing_bodies.name: Board of Directors
governing_bodies.description: Performs guidance and strategic supervision duties.

governing_bodies.name: Management Control Committee
governing_bodies.description: Exercises control body and internal audit functions.

governing_bodies.name: Nomination Committee
governing_bodies.description: Inquiry and advisory on Board appointments.

governing_bodies.name: Remuneration Committee
governing_bodies.description: Proposes and advises on remuneration systems.

governing_bodies.name: Risks and Sustainability Committee
governing_bodies.description: Advises on risk governance and sustainability.

governing_bodies.name: Committee for Transactions with Related Parties
Shareholders’ Meeting
governing_bodies.description: Expresses corporate will, approves financial statements.

governing_bodies.name: Steering Committee
governing_bodies.description: Managerial body for strategic decisions and coordination.

governing_bodies.name: Group Financial Risks Committee
governing_bodies.description: Technical body for financial risk management.

governing_bodies.name: Group Control Coordination and Non-Financial Risks Committee
governing_bodies.description: Coordinates internal control and non-financial risks.

governing_bodies.name: Group Credit Committee
governing_bodies.description: Manages and advises on credit risk issues.

governing_bodies.name: Hold To Collect and Sell (HTCS) Sign-Off Committee
governing_bodies.description: Technical body for market risk-taking proposals.

governing_bodies.name: Credit Risk and Pillar 2 Internal Models Committee
governing_bodies.description: Assesses internal models for credit and Pillar 2 risks.
